title: At what age do you think people should stop driving?
body:
we all know that your mind starts to break down as you get older

and since operating a motor vehicle at high speeds requires a lot of concentration so you don't kill anyone or cause an accident, at what age do you think people should not be allowed to operate vehicles? 

I was gonna make a poll but I forgot you can't anymore unlucky
